title: This World We Live In: It Is Wasting Away
description: A revealing account on the various occurrences in the world that greatly affect humanity This World We Live In is an absolute expression of Shannon R. Johnson feelings on Holidays, Marriage , Mistreatment of Michael Jackson and Drugs, Money,World Religion and the Goverment,Splashed with enlightening Scriptures from the Bible this eye-opening read is a call for everyone to take part and bring the world to where God wants it to be.
author: Shannon R. Johnson
